events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like a refund because this is not what I purchased.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning support agent to handle the refund case for the incorrect order delivered to the customer.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll assist you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Here is the order number 123456789 and attached is the photo showing the incorrect item I received instead of the shoes I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a free return shipping label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate the assistance and will prepare the item for return using the label.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and that the return shipping process is going smoothly.
We are closing your refund case as resolved. Thank you for your cooperation and please contact us anytime for future support.
